ProductsRange.section_title: Your Complete Beauty Arsenal: From Protection to Pampering
ProductsRange.section_description: Discover our extensive range of beauty and personal care products, meticulously crafted to cater to all your needs from head to toe. Our six product categories ensure you have everything for a comprehensive beauty routine:
ProductsRange.Deodorant & Antiperspirant_description: Antiperspirant Deodorant Spray, Roll-On Antiperspirant Deodorant, Deodorant Cream Tube
ProductsRange.Skin Care_description: Toner, Emulsion, Cream, Essence, Ampoule, Eye Cream, Mask, Pack, Cleansing
ProductsRange.Sun Care_description: Sun Cream, Sun Lotion, Sun Gel, Sun Spray, UV-IR Sun Screen, Sun Cushion Pact
ProductsRange.Body Care_description: Body Cleanser, Bubble Bath, Body Lotion, Body Spray, Body Oil
ProductsRange.Mask_description: Sheet Mask, Water Gel Mask, Cream Mask

FactoryIntroduction.title: Our State-of-the-Art Facility
FactoryIntroduction.paragraph1: Yass Factory in Guangzhou City combines modern technology with environmental sustainability. Our facility features a pharmaceutical-grade water filtration system, ensuring the highest quality standards in our production processes.
FactoryIntroduction.paragraph2: We are committed to using natural organic ingredients and recyclable packaging materials, upholding our dedication to both product excellence and environmental responsibility.

deodorant-stick.name: YASS Antiperspirant deodorant
deodorant-stick.description: This antiperspirant gel is engineered to combat odor effectively and offers up to 48 hours of advanced sweat protection. It provides a discreet and enduring defense against perspiration.

gel.name: YASS Antiperspirant clear gel
gel.description: Experience the ultimate in freshness and confidence with our Gentle Antiperspirant and Deodorant for men. Our Fresh Clear Gel fights odor instantly and offers 48-hour sweat and odor protection. The unique clear gel formula goes on smoothly, dries quickly, and delivers a burst of all-day freshness.

lotion-gold.name: YASS Shimmer body cream
lotion-gold.description: Experience the ultimate in freshness and confidence with our Gentle Antiperspirant and Deodorant for men. Our Fresh Clear Gel fights odor instantly and offers 48-hour sweat and odor protection. The unique clear gel formula goes on smoothly, dries quickly, and delivers a burst of all-day freshness.

lotion-silver.name: YASS Shimmer body cream
lotion-silver.description: Experience the ultimate in freshness and confidence with our Gentle Antiperspirant and Deodorant for men. Our Fresh Clear Gel fights odor instantly and offers 48-hour sweat and odor protection. The unique clear gel formula goes on smoothly, dries quickly, and delivers a burst of all-day freshness.

spray.name: YASS Suncare lotion
spray.description: Protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while moisturising and delicately scenting skin, the Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Face Stick seamlessly glides onto skin without leaving a greasy residue.

suncare-stick.name: YASS Airy sun stick
suncare-stick.description: Protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while moisturising and delicately scenting skin, the Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Face Stick seamlessly glides onto skin without leaving a greasy residue.

CTA.title: Need Professional Manufacturing Services?
CTA.description: We're here to support your production needs
CTA.highlights: Quick Quotes • Expert Team • Quality Service

Footer.factory_description: Yass Factory is a cutting-edge personal care product manufacturer, with exceptional expertise in advanced antiperspirant solutions. Specializing in high-quality skincare and body care products, we are particularly renowned for our innovative and effective deodorant formulations. Our state-of-the-art 25,000 square meter facility in Guangzhou combines advanced technology and stringent quality control to deliver premium products that meet the highest industry standards, especially in the antiperspirant category.
Footer.factory_address: 2nd Floor Building B, No.2, Bangsheng lst Road, Xinya Street Huadu District, Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province, P.R.China
